Study subject randomize apply study medication daily 4 week either right leave forearm . All subject apply placebo ( i.e. , topical gel without C-82 ) contralateral forearm . Both physician subject blind treatment arm assignment . Skin biopsies take mid-forearm arm baseline four week study drug test biomarker gene expression ; instruction supply provide site . Safety assessment extend 4 week final dose study drug/placebo .
